articles.author: Tanya Stukalova, Patrick Reevell
articles.title: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich to stand trial in Russia on espionage charges - ABC News
articles.description: The decision is a setback for the American taken into custody in March 2023.
articles.content: In a setback to Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, the Russian prosecutor's office announced Thursday he will stand trial on espionage charges, officially ending any future pre-detention … [+4228 chars]
